summary: the custom-built boeing 747 is believed to have cost its ultra-wealthy owner # 400million after it was customised to fit his specifications exactly over a three-year period . the jumbo jet would normally carry as many as 600 passengers - but this version was built for just a single tycoon , although he will be able to fit dozens of guests . it contains a large dining room where travellers can enjoy meals cooked in an adjoining kitchen , with a lounge and ` state room ' at the back of the plane .

aspect: 1. A custom-built Boeing 747 has been transformed into a luxury home for a mystery billionaire, featuring a dining room, multiple lounges, and an onboard restaurant.
2. The luxury plane contains a master bedroom, lounge, and conference room, and could be used for meetings in the sky.
3. The plane is one of the most luxurious private jets ever built, with a price tag of £400 million, and includes a restaurant, lounges, and multiple bedrooms.
explain: The given aspect highlights that a custom-built Boeing 747 has been transformed into a luxury home for a mystery billionaire. It features a dining room, multiple lounges, and an onboard restaurant. The aspect discusses the transformation and the luxurious amenities available on this luxurious aircraft that has been designed to cater to the specifications of a single billionaire.

The aspect talks about the luxury plane that was custom-built for a single, ultra-wealthy owner. It cost $400 million to build and was customized according to his specifications over a period of three years. The plane was built to accommodate dozens of guests and contains a dining room, lounge, master bedroom, and conference room. It could also be used for meetings in the sky. The luxurious amenities and space provided by the plane make it an ideal choice for high-end travelers who want to experience the ultimate in comfort and luxury while in the air.

The aspect states that the custom-built Boeing 747 private jet is one of the most luxurious planes ever built with a whopping price tag of £400 million. This jet was specially designed and customized to fit the specifications of a single ultra-wealthy owner. The jet can accommodate dozens of guests, and it includes a large dining room where guests can enjoy meals prepared in an adjoining kitchen, along with a lounge and a state room at the back of the plane. Its luxury features are unlike any other private jet in the world, making it a symbol of extravagance and opulence.
